long_description: A mud-, sand-, and grass-loving speed machine, the Raleigh RX 1.0 women's cyclocross bike is ready to roll on rough terrain with reliable SRAM components and a fit designed specifically for women. Butted aluminum frame delivers a great balance of stiffness and light weight; geometry, saddle and cockpit are all designed specifically to fit women. Carbon fork further reduces weight and supplies sure steering. FSA Gossamer Pro Cross crankset is outfitted with 46/36 chainrings and paired with a 12-28 cassette for just-right cyclocross gearing. SRAM Apex shifters quickly and precisely guide the Apex front derailleurs through the 20 gear combinations. Tektro CR710 cantilever brakes offer plenty of mud and grass clearance and are easily adjustable. Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires deliver solid all-around 'cross performance. Specs on the Raleigh RX 1.0 women's cyclocross bike are subject to change.
short_description: A mud-, sand-, and grass-loving speed machine, the Raleigh RX 1.0 women's cyclocross bike is ready to roll on rough terrain with reliable SRAM components and a fit designed specifically for women.
